name: Marino Beach Residence
tag_list: brazil, world-cup, holidays, accommodations, pick-up, confederation-cup
overview:
If you want to go to Brazil for holidays you must go to Fortaleza located at Northeast with beautiful beaches and with a lot of activities for those who enjoy to try different foods, radical sports, meet new people, surf, kite surf, parties, fishing, buggy ride and even more…

Fortaleza will host the Confederation and World Cup, If you want to go to Brazil start planning from now and don’t waste time and money we will be responsible to assist all of own customers and provide the best services. We do have airport pick up and fully furniture flats located at Porto das Dunas near the Beach Park the biggest aquatic park in South American.

The flats have a awesome leisure area with swimming pool, playground, restaurant, sauna, Games room, WiFi free, security 24hr and even more.. Contact us now and get a quote.

We do guarantee the best prices and to prove we will beat any competitor prices!!! Check it out!!!
